author: Peter Hadeler

review: Doesn't work. They never tell you can't watch outside the US. I have Amazon Prime and both a fire stick. Connected in the US while in vacation and works fine. When I attempted connecting in Mexico it doesn' t work!!! You don't have that problem with Apple TV!! Apple TV allows you to watch content anywhere in the world regardless where you connect it. I strongly recommend you buy Apple TV if you live outside the US and get ready to think that the only thing Amazon Prime will give you will be the two day delivery!!!! Mean while I will grab a lighter and set fire to my stick, looks like that is the only way I will be able to call it fire TV!!
author: Rafael R.
